references.paper_title: Deep residual learning for image recognition
references.reason: This foundational paper introduces the ResNet architecture, which is widely used in various computer vision tasks, including the benchmarks used in this paper to evaluate the proposed persistent TTA approach.

references.paper_title: Benchmarking neural network robustness to common corruptions and perturbations
references.reason: This paper introduces the CIFAR-10-C and ImageNet-C datasets, which are crucial benchmarks for evaluating the robustness of machine learning models and are heavily utilized in the evaluation of the persistent TTA method.

references.paper_title: Tent: Fully test-time adaptation by entropy minimization
references.reason: This paper introduces the TENT algorithm, which is a widely used test-time adaptation method.  Understanding TENT is critical to understanding the development of persistent TTA in this paper.

references.paper_title: Robust test-time adaptation in dynamic scenarios
references.reason: This paper introduces the ROTTA algorithm, a state-of-the-art test-time adaptation method which is used as a baseline comparison for the proposed persistent TTA method in this paper.
